name: Vicksburg Cheese Ball
author: Noirne
summary: Roquefort cheese and paprika give this cheese ball its special, bold flavor. Chopped mixed nuts form a pleasant, crunchy coating.
ingredients: ⅓ (8 ounce) package shredded Cheddar cheese
⅓ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
directions: In a medium bowl, blend the Cheddar cheese, cream cheese and Roquefort cheese with a fork until smooth
On a large sheet of wax paper, sprinkle paprika
Form cheese mixture into desired shape, and roll in the paprika until covered
Sprinkle mixed nuts on wax paper
Roll cheese mixture in mixed nuts until coated
Place in a medium bowl between sheets of wax paper, and chill in the refrigerator until serving
